tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE royalty_info (
    artist_id UUID,
    artist_name TEXT,
    producer_id UUID,
    producer_name TEXT,
    royalty_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    payment_date TIMESTAMP,
    PRIMARY KEY (artist_id, producer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE payments (
    payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    artist_id INT,
    producer_id INT,
    payment_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    payment_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (artist_id) REFERENCES artists(artist_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (producer_id) REFERENCES producers(producer_id)
);
CREATE TABLE artist (   artist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   artist_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,   royalty_percentage DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE producer (   producer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   producer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,   royalty_percentage DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,   production_company VARCHAR(255) );
CREATE TABLE song (   song_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   song_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,   release_date DATE NOT NULL,   genre VARCHAR(50) );

CREATE TABLE payment (   payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   artist_id INT REFERENCES artist(artist_id),   producer_id INT REFERENCES producer(producer_id),   song_id INT REFERENCES song(song_id),   payment_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,   payment_date DATE NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE royalties (
    royalty_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    artist_id UUID REFERENCES artists(artist_id),
    producer_id UUID REFERENCES producers(producer_id),
    song_id UUID REFERENCES songs(song_id),
    royalty_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    payment_date DATE NOT NULL
);
